bibdata.title: IEEE Standard for Relays and Relay Systems Associated with Electric Power Apparatus
IEEE Standard for Relays and Relay Systems Associated with Electric Power Apparatus

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: Superseded by IEEE Std C37.90-2005. This standard applies to relay systems that protect and control apparatus that generate, and distribute and use electric power. This standard defines service conditions and specifies relay performance requirements and performance information that relay manufacturers shall provide.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibitem.formattedref: IEEE Std C37.90-2005 (Revision of IEEE Std C37.90-1989)
